actions.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 226 (Roll no. 577).
Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 226 (Roll no. 577).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-264 to apply the transparency rules in the bill equally to asbestos industry defendants by requiring asbestos companies to report information about the location of their asbestos-containing products and provides an exception for trade secrets.
purpose: Amendment sought to apply the transparency rules in the bill equally to asbestos industry defendants by requiring asbestos companies to report information about the location of their asbestos-containing products and also sought to provide an exception for trade secrets.
